communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: Board of Visitors Meeting – July 10, 2021
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of the slides and any handouts presented at any of  July 2021 Board of Visitors meeting(s) covering the topics of Superintendent's Topics, Superintendent's Updates, Admissions (including incoming rat class), One Corps, One VMI, and any financial updates. The BOV website does not go back to 2021, and they are not in the VMI Archives. If you have a link for where these can be search, I am happy to go there.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking records related to the software/technology Recidiviz used by the Department.

Documents:  
- Memoranda of understanding's
- Contracts 
- Statements of Work
- User guides, product guides
- Training Guides 
- Promotional materials 
- Powerpoint presentations or other video/multimedia records about the technology

Search 2018 to today's date

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking records related to the software/technology Recidiviz used by the Department.

Documents:  
- Memoranda of understanding's
- Contracts 
- Statements of Work
- User guides, product guides
- Training Guides 
- Promotional materials 
- Powerpoint presentations or other video/multimedia records about the technology

Search 2018 to today's date

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I would like to request dispatch logs and call reports for the following sets of records:

1. All calls to 502 Michigan; El Paso, IL 61738; between 2019-01-01 until the present day.
2. Any calls that reference Corey Collins between 2013 and the present day. This should include a home invasion that occurred at 128 N Michigan; El Paso, IL 61738. I believe it was for apartment C but I could have the apartment number incorrect.
3. All calls to that same apartment for the past 5 years.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Franklin H Henninger

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I would like to request the audio recording of the initial call, dispatch logs, call report,  and body cam footage of the call made by Corey Collins of El Paso, IL to 1601 Jadens Way, Washington, IL for a visitation dispute on July 2, 2025 between 2pm and 4:30pm CST.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Franklin H Henninger
